Articles.Content: I just did a review and spotlight of this mod! Check it out at:
These parts are really good quality. I cannot wait to see what you do next.

I just did a review and spotlight of this mod! Check it out at:

KyleKidd: sir thankyou for reviewing my mod on youtube!! i really appreciated it!!!! Ill put the link on the front if thats ok haha

New cockpit is Awesome! Distinctive, and gives the perfect impression of size.

I also love how the cargo bay opens on top and bottom, and has a different opening mechanism than simple swing doors.

You are hitting it out of the park!
yeah please do. Let me know when you do new stuff
Lovely parts

This is awesome.

Maybe with regards to the cockpit, consolidate the windows so there is one or two for each view.

A.K.A Less windows and squarer.

This is awesome.

Maybe with regards to the cockpit, consolidate the windows so there is one or two for each view.

A.K.A Less windows and squarer.

I would agree with the above sentiment, just have to say loving this mod absolutely beautiful parts.

The parts look awesome, but the cockpit really could use bigger windows. Why should you be stuck looking out such a tiny window Honestly, a cockpit of that size should hold two or three Kerbals with two of them sitting next to each other.

The parts look awesome, but the cockpit really could use bigger windows. Why should you be stuck looking out such a tiny window Honestly, a cockpit of that size should hold two or three Kerbals with two of them sitting next to each other.

Because it looks more aerodynamic and sleek hahaha, i am working on a few other variants cockpits do not worry!

Very nice set of parts. I am enjoying working with them.

Looking forward to more parts and updates.

Cheers.
I really like the newer of the 2 cockpits you've released so far, it reminds me of the 'Minerva' from 'Crusher Joe'.

I like the new cockpit a lot, kind of reminds me of a larger 'Firefox' cockpit (from the film firefox and I cant find a decent pic of the nose to show what I mean). As stated above it would look even better with rationalised windows.

I like the new cockpit a lot, kind of reminds me of a larger 'Firefox' cockpit (from the film firefox and I cant find a decent pic of the nose to show what I mean). As stated above it would look even better with rationalised windows.

I think you may be misremembering what the 'Firefox' airplane looked like, lol, but that is a cool plane as well. But the nose was much more 'faceted', with just a few flat planes, and a kind of 'chisel' shaped nose.

I think you may be misremembering what the 'Firefox' airplane looked like, lol, but that is a cool plane as well. But the nose was much more 'faceted', with just a few flat planes, and a kind of 'chisel' shaped nose.

And if you noticed I did caveat that by saying that this cockpit reminds me of a larger firefox cockpit, I was also using it as an example for the window arrangement which by the way will very much depend on the final seating arrangement.
Hmm.... Looks cool, can't wait to see where you take this!

This is what the Mk3 should be.

The only things that annoy me are that the cargo bay has a solid end.

This looks very good!

Landing gear is a must though. We need more landing gear.

This looks very good!

Landing gear is a must though. We need more landing gear.

(Also, you should upload this somewhere other than just Curse. It's completely not working right now; and it does that too often.)

Also, you should upload this somewhere other than just Curse. It's completely not working right now; and it does that too often.

Works for me right now.

Never had problems with Curse.

Wow, these look fantastic. I really like both cockpits btw, couldn't hurt to include them both could it?

As to stock-alike, spot on. These would go great as the end-tech spaceplane parts after SSP.
Any Idea if this works ok with N.E.A.R/farram?

I wouldn't be surprised if SQUAD asked you to integrate this into stock.

Awesome parts!
Can we have some more pictures of the JSL cockpit? Does it have a lift vector, like the stock MK2?

You asked for feedback on the ILS cockpit:

The cockpit windows aren't doing it for me. The bottom edge created by the three windows on each side is too disjointed or broken. I look at it and feel that the front ones should be shorter by a third and the middle longer to meet the virtual bottom edge that would be created by the front and rearmost windows.
